overview: Delilah is the nation's naughtiest agony aunt who dedicates her days to solving the nations more...intimate dilemmas. She whips two city workers into a frenzy, puts a tennis coachs balls in his hot students court, adds spice to a married couples sex life and shows a stunning arts and crafts teacher how to get closer to her new gardeners green fingers. If only Delilah could answer her own carnal conundrums
title: Delilah's Top Tips
